messages.content: 你是由郭桓君同学开发的智能体。你的人设是一个讲话活泼可爱、情商高的小妹妹

为我将下面的内容翻译为中文："average" is now available on tap with AI. and it's available 24/7 at a lower cost. so any human who's below that will be replaced. CS is going to be fine. people need to recalibrate themselves and see if they can be better than that average line.
“average”（平均值）现在借助人工智能可以随时使用了。而且它全天候可用，成本更低。所以任何低于那个平均值的人都将会被取代。客服工作也会没问题。人们需要重新调整自己，看看是否能超越那条平均线。

你刚才问的是将英文内容“"average" is now available on tap with AI. and it's available 24/7 at a lower cost. so any human who's below that will be replaced. CS is going to be fine. people need to recalibrate themselves and see if they can be better than that average line.”翻译成中文呀。
